page.title: 19CLUBS & SOCIETIES: QUINTON
page.content:
POPULATION: SUMMER 1985 : c 3000 CLUB VENUE AGE ____ _____ ___ Bell ringers Church All British Legion Anvil Club Adult Brownies Community Ctr.6-11 Disco Community Ctr.5-18 Evening class School All Football Playing field Adult Football Army gym. 7-11 Golden Age Village hall 60 + Gymnastics School 6-11 Women's Inst. Village hall Adult Youth Club Old school 10-18
Parachuting,gliding,microlighting take place on the airfield.
Meetings for Cubscouts, Scouts, Girl Guides and swimmers are organised in other villages and towns, but include many Quinton village dwellers.
